scripts.create: for i in {1..5}; do mkdir _0${i}_ ; done;
scripts.create:js: for i in {1..5}; do (cd _0${i}_ && touch index.js) ; done;
scripts.create:py: for i in {1..5}; do (cd _0${i}_ && touch index.py) ; done;
scripts.create:kt: for i in {1..5}; do (cd _0${i}_ && touch index.kt) ; done;
scripts.create:java: for i in {1..5}; do (cd _0${i}_ && touch index.java) ; done;
